fi.cebylfwk.shape
Interface Shape2D

All Superinterfaces:
Renderable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Quad
public interface Shape2D
extends Renderable

This represents visible renderable shape in game developed with this framework. For example sprite and rectangle could implement this interface.
